transcripts.text: here's to the brave ones the heroes your brothers your husbands your fathers your sons who harbor no fear they are not fond of playing it safe and they have no admiration for those who would avoid a challenge.  you can scorn them Derate them.  Deride or even vilify them.  About the only thing you cannot do is dismiss them.  Because they protect people.  They keep the human race safe.  And while some may see them as reckless, we see them as heroic.  Because the ones who are brave enough to think they can save the world are the ones that usually do.
